name: solana-transactions-executor
description: A small solution to operate solana transactions: create, sign, send, chunk, support ledger etc.

scripts.publish:major: yarn build && npm version major && yarn build && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: yarn build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: yarn build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.build: yarn clear-dist && yarn build-esm && yarn build-cjs
scripts.prepare: husky install ./.husky && chmod ug+x .husky/* && chmod ug+x .git/hooks/*

author: Vladislav Sablevsky <sablevsky@gmail.com>
